text: This location is reasonably quick and I've always liked my food from this location.  It is a snall one that does a lot of volume.  It is right next door to a 7-11 and a takeout restaurant.   If you see those, turn in.   You are there.

text: Promised delivery in 30 - 40 minutes which turned into 70 minutes. What was finally delivered was Ice Cold Cardboard. Not even lukewarm.  Minimal toppings. Really Bad!  This was the worst experience but have had similar results in the past from this location. Do yourself a favor and go pick it up from Buddy's!
